source.name: 1990's
source.description: I have always thought there are some great stories from the 'good old days' in the P&T (& Eircell) that are worth collecting, sharing and keeping for posterity !                         Click on page view over 'Story Details' for easier reading. If you enjoyed the stories then please add or email some using the form headers as a guide (perrity@gmail.com)  and pass the link on to someone else who might be interested.                  Please avoid identifying individuals by full name, use first name or an alias.                          Please don't add stories that by their nature will offend. This is not intended to humiliate but to gather anecdotes of a time gone by.
